participant_1.background:
I like to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories.
i have won an olympic medal.
I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time.
I take pride in my appearance.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.

participant_2.background:
I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life.
I love my students.
I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby.
i sing in the church choir.
I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Hi! It's a beautiful day so I'm trying to get outside and enjoy it!
That's awesome! What are you doing outside?
I'm going for a walk with my dog and then I'm going to read in the park.
Sounds like a perfect day! I wish I could join you.
You're welcome to join me! What are you doing today?
I'm working on a project for a class. I'm really excited about it, but it's also a lot of work.
I know the feeling! I have a lot of work to do too, but I'm trying to stay focused and get it done.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I love my job and I love working with kids.
That's awesome! I've always thought about being a teacher, but I'm not sure if I have the patience.
It takes a lot of patience, but it's also very rewarding.
I bet it is! I'm sure your students love you.
They're pretty great kids!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to sing in the church choir. I also love to read and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read too.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say! I have a lot of favorites.
Me too! I love reading different genres.
Me too! I think that's why I have so many favorites.
It's nice to meet you! I think we're going to be good friends.
I think so too
